abstract: At a news conference in London on Wednesday, he announced that he would create a new "Sleeping Beauty" for Christmas 2012.
snippet: At a news conference in London on Wednesday, he announced that he would create a new "Sleeping Beauty" for Christmas 2012.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- He has turned his hand to "Swan Lake," "The Nutcracker," "La Sylphide" and "Cinderella," but Matthew Bourne isn't done yet rethinking the ballet classics. At a news conference at Sadler's Wells on Wednesday, he announced that he would create a new "Sleeping Beauty" for Christmas 2012 as part of a yearlong celebration of the 25th anniversary of his company, New Adventures.

headline.main: A New 'Sleeping Beauty,' Courtesy of Matthew Bourne
